New Records: Paul Skenes dropped his season-long ERA to 1.99, becoming the second player since 1913 to post a sub-2.00 ERA through 22 career appearances.
Key Match Events: Paul Skenes struck out nine hitters across five scoreless innings.
Nick Yorke hit his first extra-base hit, a solo shot that traveled an estimated 442 feet.
Post-Match Reflections: Paul Skenes said it would be 'pretty cool' to win Rookie of the Year.
Joey Bart expressed pride in Skenes' performance, saying he continues to come out and put zeros on the board.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pirates' bullpen preserved the 2-0 lead with scoreless innings from Colin Holderman, Carmen Mlodzinski, Dennis Santana, and Aroldis Chapman.
Nick Yorke hit his first extra-base hit in his MLB career.
